issue.title: VMRC Package support for ROS melodic

content.raw: When I try the Build from source option, I get errors trying to run catkin_make. This is mostly due to the fact that I can not install the dependencies, such as gazebo7 (Ubuntu 18.04 starts at gazebo9),  as well as all the ros kinetic packages and plugins (some packages/plugins do not exist on melodic, such as the gazebo plugin, and I can not apt install the kinetic version).
content.html: When I try the Build from source option, I get errors trying to run catkin_make. This is mostly due to the fact that I can not install the dependencies, such as gazebo7 (Ubuntu 18.04 starts at gazebo9), as well as all the ros kinetic packages and plugins (some packages/plugins do not exist on melodic, such as the gazebo plugin, and I can not apt install the kinetic version).
